Les restaurants GOURMET proposent une re: GOURMET restaurants offer a unique recipe, designed for purists and developed with a minimalist approach. Every detail is carefully considered to enhance the essentials: the perfect balance between quality ingredients and authentic flavors. The burgers are made with French brioche buns, exceptional meats (Charolaise and Limousine), premium cheese, and a secret homemade sauce, the brand's true signature. Each ingredient is carefully selected to ensure an unforgettable taste experience. Available in several sizes, from S to XXL, smash burgers cater to all appetites, with one to five patties to choose from. For a personalized touch, add jalapeño pickles for extra spice or caramelized onions for a perfect balance of sweetness and intensity.
Parce qu’un burger ne se déguste jamais: Because a burger is never enjoyed alone, GOURMET offers ultra-crispy fries, even for delivery! And for fried chicken lovers, the Panko Chicken Bites, coated in Japanese breadcrumbs, provide an incredibly crispy texture. True to the 'less is more' concept, GOURMET focuses on simplicity and excellence for a memorable culinary experience from the very first bite. Whether on-site or for delivery, GOURMET promises an explosion of flavors at every moment.
